page.title: 11WRITTLE,SHOPS AND AMENITIES
page.content: Most villagers shop in Chelmsford but this is a caror bus ride away. The Green has several amenities that together provide most of the things that people may need inbetween these shopping trips. There are several shops including a grocer's selling things from bread to vegetables and even take away soup and sandwiches. There is a post office which is handy for old people and mothers, a library, banks, building societies and a hairdressers. Two garages sell petrol and service and repair cars. The Green has a good Indian restaurant and several public houses. The village hall is an important building because not only is a baby clinic and play school held there but it is also used for meetings, jumble sales and all the other things that help keep the community spirit of our village alive.
